ProductInfo.Features:
The Dome Video CCTV Surveillance Camera Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillance Systems to Keep Home, Office, Hotel etc. Safe.
White Dome Shape, No Audio, 3.6mm Lens for Wide View Angle, BNC Connection, DC 12V 500MA Regulated Power Supply.
Image Sensor: 1/4 CMOS CCD. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. Signal System: NTSC. Effective Pixels: 512 (H) x 492 (V).
Built-in auto electronic shutter(AES) function, 1/100000s high speed of color camera's AES.
Auto White Balance, Internal Sync Speed, Backlight Compensation, Low Power Consumption Board Make Its Performance Stable.
ProductInfo.Name: ePathChina® Dome 420TVL 1/4 CMOS CCD Sensor CCTV Surveillance System Camera,Plastic High Resolution & High Definition and Stability Color Security Camera, DC 12V Inputs, 3.6mm Fixed Lens, Vandal-Proof White Dome CCTV Survillance Camera for Indoor/Home/Business Security Video Surveillance
